item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of road to 163, 28th January
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road from number 163 two green painted metal boxes both graffiti tagged – not BT design as far a I am aware. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for reporting pin &, picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosendale Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road from 13 Sydcote, 28th January
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road from number 13 Sydcote (which is next to 163 Rosendale Rd) green painted metal box graffiti tagged – not BT design as far a I am aware. item.title: Dangerous pothole, 28th January
item.description:
‘A stitch in time saves nine.’ This road surface is rapidly wearing away exposing the metal drain cover and posing a serious risk to motorists driving down Leesons Hill. Please repair it as soon as possible to avoid it worsening. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 195, Leesons Hill, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamp post cut down mid way on Luddesdon road, 28th January
item.description:
The lamp post has been cut down with no notice or explanation. Due to the rain etc recently the blue electrical tape has come away leading to the inner electrics being exposed to the elements. Furthermore this makes an entire patch of the street in almost darkness with disabled or vulnerable residents living in the properties nearby having to cross the street to be safe so as not to trip in the dark

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Luddesdon Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
